languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}Critical hit chance{/g} is increased by +<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>%. Each critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} inflicts the {g|f:c24f558c424947de8d1ecb834526d841}terrified{/g} effect on the target for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
languages.original_text: Critical chance is increased by 2*(AGI Bonus)%. When target is hit by critical strike this attack applies FrightenedBuff for 3 rounds (target's MP are halved, WP, WS and BS are decreased by 15)
